text:
(non-hs related) Because I just spent hours doing this between last night and this morning:

For those with issues installing Acrobat DC on a computer and you keep getting the:
`Third party payload installer Adobe Acrobat\Setup.exe failed with exit code: 1603` error, there is a page where you can download the standalone installer:
<https://helpx.adobe.com/acrobat/kb/acrobat-dc-downloads.html>
